aic2021.user

Class UnitInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • aic2021.user.UnitInfo

  • public class UnitInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with the information of a given unit at a given timestamp. Note that the values are immutable, and thus they don't update over time. For example if a unit receives damage, any UnitInfo associated to that unit will not change.

    • Constructor Summary
